text: visvasigale, heccina sansayagalinda duraviri. Kelavu sansayagalu papagalagive. Mattu nivu paraspara behugarike nadesabedi hagu nim'malli yaru innobbarannu avara benna hinde dusisabaradu. Nim'malli yaradaru tanna mrta sahodarana mansa tinnuvudannu meccuttaneye? Khandita, adu nimage tira apriyavagide. Hagadare, allahanige anjiri. Khanditavagiyu allahanu pascattapa svikarisuvavanu mattu karunaluvagiddane
